I'm a

Full Stack Developer

About: I'm a recent M.Sci Computer Science graduate with a history in design, a budding open-source software enthusiast, and wannabe Haskeller.

I love to create beautiful and useful software and am currently looking for a job as a developer. See below for some examples of my work to get an idea of what I can do when supplied enough caffeine :) ↴

~$ academic-work_

A Constructive Formalisation of Hoare Logic within the Interactive Theorem Prover Agda

A Constructive Formalisation of Hoare Logic within the Interactive Theorem Prover Agda

A constructive formalisation of Hoare Logic in the interactive theorem prover Agda. The final result is a constructive formalisation of Hoare logic and an Agda library that is fit for the purpose of proving correct simple imperative-style programs using the formalised Hoare logic.

Tags: Agda Formal Logic Type Theory Programming Language Semantics Formal Proof

Creating a Robotic Waiter using a Pioneer P3DX Robot and Particle Filtering

Creating a Robotic Waiter using a Pioneer P3DX Robot and Particle Filtering

A constructive formalisation of Hoare Logic in the interactive theorem prover Agda. The final result is a constructive formalisation of Hoare logic and an Agda library that is fit for the purpose of proving correct simple imperative-style programs using the formalised Hoare logic.

Tags: C++ Robotics Particle Filter Java/Android Clustering Uncertainty

~$ contact-me_

If you want to contact me for whatever reason - be it for networking, to tell me about a job opportunity, or just to say hi - your best bet is to email me at contact@fraserbrooks.io. Alternatively you can reach out to me on LinkedIn. Either way I'll endeavour to get back to you promptly. Thanks for stopping by!
